reviewtext: I use products for more than 30 years, and never had one goes bad, I missed their lenses, I do not know why they stop to make lenses, they make goog lenses for affortable price. I have many Vivitar lenses, specily the 100 mm macro, and all others, no one goes bad. I have 2 Vivitar 283 flash, I use them for more than 25 years, and they perform like new, I hope that this 285 will do the same, it is so far so good. Many thanks to Vivitar.
